name: Weapon Hex
text: Living Weapon — Response: After you play a [[spell ]]event, ready Weapon Hex and discard X cards from the top of the encounter deck, where X is equal to the printed cost of that event (Limit once per phase.)

name: Laura Kinney
text: Hex Chaos — Setup: Find and put into play Chaos Magic. Action: shuffle a [[spell ]]card from your discard pile into your deck. (Limit once per round.)

name: Chaos Magic
text: Permanent. Setup. Hero Action: Exhaust Chaos Magic → search your deck for a [[spell ]]card and add it to your hand. Then discard 3 cards from the top of the encounter deck.

name: Speed Weasel
text: Hero Response: After Speed Weasel activates, ready Speed Weasel and Weapon Hex (limit once per round). “My name is Speed Weasel!!!”

name: Special Target
text: Hero Action: Deal X damage to an enemy, where X is equal to your ATK. “An Hex marks the spot.”

name: From Nothing
text: Hero Action: Remove X threat from a scheme, where X is equal to your THW. “You’re nothing.”

name: Death Ray
text: Hero Action: Deal 7 damage to an enemy. If you discard 1 card from the top of the encounter deck, deal those damage among enemies in play. “Don’t threaten my sister!”

name: Magic Protection
text: Hero Interrupt: When a friendly character would take any amount of damage, prevent 5 of that damage.

name: Warp Reality
text: Hero Interrupt: When an encounter card is revealed from the encounter deck, cancel all of its effects and discard it. Discard cards from the top of the encounter deck equal to the number of boost icons on that card.

name: Regenerative Longevity
text: Action: Heal 4 damage from among your identity and Speed Weasel.

name: Chaotic Energy
text: Resource: Exhaust Chaotic Energy → generate a [wild] resource for a [[spell ]]event.

name: Magical Healing
text: Interrupt: When Weapon Hex would be defeated, set her hit point dial to 6 instead. Then, discard this card.

name: Weapon Hex’s Claws
text:
Restricted.
